name: Shadle
desc: Shadle is a web app that implements a Wordle-style game for guessing colors. It provides server side answer validation and statistics tracking.

name: Rust Mini Projects
desc: Multiple small, independent Rust projects designed for learning and practicing Rust programming concepts. Includes interactive games such as Blackjack and Guess the Number.

name: Clip Forge
desc: Autonomously discovers clips from Twitch by analyzing sentiment, audio, and chat speed, and then turns them into a compilation.

name: Raylib Starter
desc: A Raylib starter template with scene management and other utilities for new games, based on the engine I built for Mycelium Maze.

name: Unigram and Bigram Language Models
desc: Unigram and bigram language models with Laplace and Add-k smoothing, unknown word handling, and perplexity evaluation.

name: Neural Networks for Sentiment Analysis
desc: Feedforward and recurrent neural networks for 5-class sentiment analysis on Yelp reviews using PyTorch with bag-of-words and word embeddings.

name: Model Comparison for Sentiment Analysis
desc: Comparison of Logistic Regression, LSTM, Text CNN, and TinyBERT for sentiment analysis, exploring trade-offs between complexity, training time, and accuracy.

name: Harmonic Links
desc: A web app to discover connections between artists and albums through their musical collaborations. Built with Next.js, Express, and Supabase.

name: Mycelium Maze
desc: A raycasted dungeon crawler built in C++ with raylib. Features turn-based RPG combat, inventory systems, and multiple floors with boss fights.

name: Nginx Static
desc: A lightweight NGINX Docker image for hosting static content in multistage builds, with ETag caching, no server tokens, and Brotli/GZip compression.

name: Vue TS Node Monorepo Template
desc: A full-stack monorepo template with Vue.js, TypeScript, and Node.js, featuring pnpm, devcontainers, ESLint, UnoCSS, and Vite.

name: Devcontainer Features
desc: Custom devcontainer features for VSCode, including 'alpine-nvm' for Node.js version management on Alpine Linux.

name: HCR using CNNs
desc: Convolutional neural networks for handwritten character recognition on MNIST and EMNIST datasets, achieving 99.6% accuracy with TensorFlow and Keras Tuner.

name: Query Quest
desc: A trivia game for competing on leaderboards with random categories and questions. Includes stat tracking. Built with Vue.js, FastAPI, and PostgreSQL.

name: Fintasy
desc: Paper trading platform simulating stock trading with tournaments and leaderboards. Built with Vue.js, Python FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and TypeScript.

name: EPUB Insert Generator
desc: A Python tool for generating EPUB3 xhtml image insert pages from JSON definitions with styled layouts and OPF manifest entries.

name: Data Doctor
desc: A full-stack web app for quality control on ML training datasets with interactive editing, queue-based review, and ML-powered duplicate detection.

name: Simple Dark
desc: A dark theme extension for Google Chrome that provides a clean, dark interface for the browser. Reminiscent of firefox's default dark theme.

name: Blackjack C++
desc: A console-based Blackjack card game in C++ with ASCII card rendering, hit/stand/split mechanics, and automatic deck reshuffling.

name: URL Shortener
desc: A lightweight Node.js library for generating and managing URL short codes with customizable options, TypeScript support, and zero dependencies.

name: TAMU Grades
desc: A web application for Texas A&M students to search and analyze courses, professors, and historical grade distribution reports with an intuitive interface.

name: Server Commander
desc: A TypeScript Discord bot for controlling game servers with modular slash commands, event listeners, and REST API integration.

name: LeetCode TS
desc: A TypeScript LeetCode solutions collection with custom testing framework, benchmarking, and CLI tool for auto-generating solution files.

name: XO Market Bot
desc: A Python automation tool for the game Crossout that automatically buys, crafts, and sells items at optimal prices using OCR and template matching.

name: Enchant Tweaker
desc: A Fabric mod for Minecraft that allows extensive customization of enchantment mechanics with 68 configuration options while maintaining the vanilla feel.

name: Game Engine V2
desc: A Java game engine with screen management, UI components, keybind handling, logging, and audio. Reusable engine framework for my Java game projects.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: My personal portfolio website showcasing projects and experience. Built with Vue.js, TypeScript, UnoCSS, Vite, and other modern web technologies.

name: TAMU Grade Distribution Website
desc: A sleek interface for browsing and analyzing Texas A&M University's grade distribution data with fast loading and responsive design.

name: TAMU Grade Distribution Parser
desc: An automated parser for Texas A&M University's grade distribution PDFs, downloads reports from 2014 onwards and stores results in MySQL.

name: Image Stylizer
desc: A plugin-based image processing tool with extensible plugins, CLI configuration, and optimized performance using NumPy and Numba JIT compilation.

name: Generic Discord Bot
desc: A quick-start template for Discord bots with multi-server support, customizable commands, and permission levels to accelerate development.

name: UNO
desc: A fully functional UNO card game implemented in Java in 24 hours. Features complete game mechanics, AI opponents, saving, and a graphical interface.

name: PoC RPG
desc: A playable RPG proof of concept built with my custom game engine. Features tile-based levels, animations, audio, scripting, chat commands, and NPC quests.

name: Tower Defense Remastered
desc: A remastered tower defense game where players strategically defend against increasing enemy waves, inspired by Bloons Tower Defense.

name: UNO Online
desc: An extension of my UNO clone game adding online multiplayer functionality, featuring matchmaking, lobbies, and real-time gameplay.

name: Perlin Noise Island
desc: An experiment in procedural generation. Uses Perlin noise algorithms to generate a random tile based map to explore.

name: Prop Hunt
desc: An unfinished prop hunt style game where hiders disguise themselves as props while hunters search for them. Includes spawners, props, and fog of war mechanics.

name: Ultimate Tic-Tac-Toe
desc: A much more complex variant of Tic-Tac-Toe with a 3x3 grid of smaller boards, where each move determines the next playable board.

name: Tank Battle
desc: A simple tank battle game where players control a tank and fight against three AI-controlled tanks in an arena with powerups.

name: Rainbow Snake Game
desc: A Snake game where each square randomly changes colors every tick, creating a chaotic and disorienting visual experience.

name: GitHub Profile
desc: A link to my GitHub profile for more projects.
